PHPMAILER_SMTP_HOST.title: SMTP Host
PHPMAILER_SMTP_HOST.description: Set the SMTP Host needed to login to the SMTP email server

PHPMAILER_SMTP_PORT.title: SMTP Port
PHPMAILER_SMTP_PORT.description: Set the SMTP Port (Default: 465) needed to login to the SMTP email server

PHPMAILER_SMTP_SECURITY.title: SMTP SECURITY
PHPMAILER_SMTP_SECURITY.description: Set the SMTP Security protocol to use when sending SSL, TLS or NONE

PHPMAILER_SMTP_USERNAME.title: SMTP Username
PHPMAILER_SMTP_USERNAME.description: Set the SMTP Username (usually an email address) needed to login to the SMTP email server

PHPMAILER_SMTP_PASSWORD.title: SMTP Password
PHPMAILER_SMTP_PASSWORD.description: Set the SMTP Password needed to login to the SMTP email server

PHPMAILER_SMTP_FROM_ADDRESS.title: SMTP From Address
PHPMAILER_SMTP_FROM_ADDRESS.description: Email Address that the email will be sent from
